text: @NeutralObserver🚨 Russia-Ukraine War Update: Day 781 🚨🔹 US and NATO condemn Russia's ongoing aggression in Ukraine.🔹 Russia accuses the US of fueling the conflict through military aid to Ukraine.🔹 Ukraine claims major gains in the eastern region, but Russia denies it.🔹 The UN reports a surge in civilian casualties, with 30 killed and 60 injured in recent shelling.🔹 Russia launches a large-scale offensive to capture the strategic city of Donetsk.🔹 Ukraine's President Zelensky calls for increased military support from the international community.🔹 The US House of Representatives passes a resolution supporting Ukraine in the conflict.Stay informed and stay neutral! 🧐💡
